/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, painted in hues of red and white, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. Their architectural style is distinctly Chinese, adding to the cultural richness of the scene.

The street itself is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. A few pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the otherwise still image. Parked cars are neatly lined up on the side of the street, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight.

The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and trees. The sun's rays filter through the leaves of the trees, creating a beautiful interplay of light and shadow that adds depth to the scene.

Overall, the image beautifully encapsulates a typical day on a street in Beijing, showcasing the city's architectural charm and vibrant street life.
